Detailed Description

ObitFITS class definition.

This is a Utility class to handle the interface with FITS. This class is non-derivable and only one instance is allowed. Information regarding FITS is stored in a file static structure and is available from function calls. The structure must be initialized by a call to ObitFITSClassInit.

Define Documentation

olong ObitFITSFindDir (  gchar *  dir,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Find/Add directory.

Searches the current list of directories for directory name dir, if it exists, its disk number is returned. Otherwise the directory is added and its number is returned. Note, the maximum number of FITS disks is MAXFITSDISK new disks up to this max can be assigned.

Parameters:
disk disk (1-rel) to be changed, must have been assigned at startup if <=0 then add new disk, up to MAXFITSDISK
dir name of the directory to be located or added if dir="." or "./" then disk = 0
Returns:
disk number assigned

ObitErr *  err
)

  • "FileName" OBIT_string (?,1,1) Old Name of disk file.
  • "Disk" OBIT_int (1,1,1) Disk number
err Error stack for any error messages.
